title: Warhammer 40K Fiction - Complete Horus Heresy Series (Jan 2014)
description:
This torrent collates the entire Horus Heresy series of Warhammer 40 000 literature, including novels, novellas, short stories, graphic novels and audio dramas as of January 2014.

All e-books are in .mobi format, audioboks are 256kbps .mp3s.

Titles listed below. Also see included spreadsheet for further publication details.

(Remember, if you enjoy these books, buy them. Support the authors)
